content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) refueled and supplied with iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) supplying items to the furnace.
- Wooden Chest at position (2.5, 0.5) connected to the inserter.
- Transport Belt from position (3.5, 0.5) to (5.5, 0.5) moving items to the next section.
- Wooden Chest at position (7.5, 0.5) storing iron plates.

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) refueled and supplied with copper ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (11.5, 0.5) supplying items to the furnace.
- Wooden Chest at position (12.5, 0.5) receiving copper plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chests at positions (40.5, -83.5) and (42.5, -83.5) storing coal and copper plates.
- Transport Belt from position (40.5, -83.5) to (38.5, -83.5) moving coal.

### Iron and Copper Storage
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) storing iron plates and copper plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when supplying items to inserters
- Ensure that the source entity contains the required items before attempting to supply them to inserters. Verify the inventory of the source entity.
- Ensure there is a nearby entity that can accept items from the inserter. Check the placement of inserters and their target entities.

### Errors when extracting items
- Confirm that the target chest or entity has available items before attempting extraction. Regularly check and manage inventories to prevent extraction errors.

### Errors with blocked transport belts
- Regularly clear blockages on transport belts to ensure smooth operation. Check for any items that may be causing the blockage and remove them.

### Errors with full chests
- Monitor the inventory levels of chests to prevent them from becoming full. Regularly empty chests to maintain continuous operation of connected entities like mining drills.

### Errors with inventory management
- Ensure that there is enough space in your inventory before attempting to harvest or extract items. Manage your inventory to prevent it from becoming full.
